name: express-restapi
description: - Example of a Rest API is like you search for something and you get a list of results back from the service your requesting from.  - An API is an application programming interface. It is a set of rules that allow programs to talk to each other. The developer creates the api on the server and allows client to talk to it. - Rest determines how the api looks like. Rest stands for Representational state transfer. - It is a set of rules that developers follow when  they create their api's. - Nowadays almost all api's are rest api's. ## CRUD  - Crud is an achronym that stands for:     - Create aka HTTP POST method     - Read aka HTTP GET method     - Update aka HTTP PUT method     - Delete aka HTTP DELETE METHOD - Examples of crud.     - whenever having a data base of users need to be able to create user account GET or READ profile details.      - UPDATE the profile details.      - OR DELETE and account if the user no longer wants it. ## url to download node https://nodejs.org/en/[https://nodejs.org/en/] - Use node to create server side javascript applications. ## install Express and info - npm install express - Express is a web framework for Node.js. This will help us create different routes for api. - testing endpoints on postman
